titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the feasibility and suitability of designating the 9-11 Memorial in West Orange, New Jersey, as unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study to determine the feasibility and suitability of designating the 9-11 Memorial in West Orange, New Jersey, as unit of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to carry out a study regarding the suitability and feasibility of designating the 9-11 Memorial in West Orange, New Jersey, as a unit of the National Park System.
